data.headline: Nasdaq futures drop 0.67%, underperforming S&P 500 and Dow in early premarket action
bullets: S&P 500 futures down 0.27-0.42%, Dow off 0.06-0.27% as all major indices extend last week's declines
Tech and AI-exposed stocks continue to face selling pressure amid ongoing disruption concerns
Recent sector weakness also seen in real estate, trucking, and finance stocks
No major earnings or economic data releases scheduled today, contributing to thin trading volumes
Markets remain sentiment-driven with little new information following the Presidents' Day holiday
Traders prepare for a shortened week and delayed data reports, adding to uncertainty
